General.Name: Electreon Wireless Ltd
General.Description: Electreon Wireless Ltd engages in the research, development, and implementation of the wireless electric road system in Israel. Its wireless electric road system is a shared, invisible platform that wirelessly charges commercial and passenger electric vehicles while driving. The company offers its solution for governments, cities, and fleet operators, as well as offers static, dynamic, and semi-dynamic charging solutions for electric vehicles. Electreon Wireless Ltd was founded in 2013 and is based in Beit Yanai, Israel.
General.Address: Hadassah Neurim Youth Village, Beit Yanai, Israel, 4029800
